properties.Non-Terrestrial_fill_value_class_32761: Land cover assigned as "unclassified" or not able to determine
properties.Non-Terrestrial_fill_value_class_32763: Land cover assigned as "permanent" wetlands/inundated marshland
properties.Non-Terrestrial_fill_value_class_32764: Land cover assigned as perennial snow, ice
properties.Non-Terrestrial_fill_value_class_32765: Land cover assigned as barren, sparse vegetation (rock, tundra, desert)
properties.Non-Terrestrial_fill_value_class_32766: Land cover assigned as perennial salt or water bodies
properties.MODLAND_QC_bits_0: Good Quality - main algorithm with or without saturation
properties.MODLAND_QC_bits_1: Other Quality - back-up algorithm or fill values
properties.DEADDETECTOR_0: Detectors apparently fine for up to 50% of channels 1,2
properties.DEADDETECTOR_1: Dead detectors caused >50% adjacent detector retrieval
properties.SCF_QC_000: 0, Main (RT) method used, best result possible (no saturation)
properties.SCF_QC_001: 1, Main (RT) method used with saturation. Good,very usable
properties.SCF_QC_010: 2, Main (RT) method failed due to bad geometry, empirical algorithm used
properties.SCF_QC_011: 3, Main (RT) method failed due to problems other than geometry, empirical algorithm used
properties.SCF_QC_100: 4, Pixel not produced at all, value coudn't be retrieved (possible reasons: badL1B data, unusable MOD09GA data)
